forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening clouds will give way to clearing overnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly clear after midnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 53F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low 41F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low near 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 15C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 16C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 62F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
